snippet.title: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire? (Dreamcast) Longplay (4K) - Funny parody game!
snippet.description:
A longplay of Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire? on the Sega Dreamcast. It's a fun and absurd parody of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire hosted by "Egregious Philbin" LMAO! Pick your (least) favorite millionaire archetype, answer questions, and take them to the cleaners! You'll also get some special weapons along the way that vary based on who you're attacking. Also, this was developed by Hypnotix and published by Simon & Schuster Interactive in 2000. Did people really hate "Ronald Hump" that much back then!? I didn't think so, but I guess I was wrong? Like, share and subscribe for more longplays, walkthroughs and other gaming content! Also consider supporting us below!

Check out my merch link! It's a huge help!
https://bit.ly/LPLstore

Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/3rAVBVG
The above link will give us a small kickback if you buy something on Amazon at NO extra cost to you, so supporting us that way is "free"! Same with the links below.

My Setup:
CPU: Ryzen 7 3700X - https://amzn.to/3efuA6x (I use the stock cooler).
GPU: Radeon RX 6800 XT - https://amzn.to/2PGWm1F
SSD: Sabrent Rocket 1TB (PCIe 3.0) - https://amzn.to/2OyikmH
HDD: WD Gold 8TB - https://amzn.to/3ecxBod
RAM: Corsair Vengeance 3200mhz (32GB) - https://amzn.to/3qmlnM7
PSU: Corsair RM1000X Gold - https://amzn.to/30kNpx2
Editing Software: VEGAS PRO 18 - https://amzn.to/3ehdOnv

Chapters:
0:00 - Channel Intro, opening credits etc
0:26 - Intro Movie
1:20 - Title screen, getting started
1:40 - Selecting our victim: "Ronald Hump"? LMAO
2:13 - Let's play!
15:40 - We won!
16:12 - Credits
